Method Detail

getName

java.lang.String getName()
The name assigned to this listener

Returns:

isCallbackOrderingPrereq

boolean isCallbackOrderingPrereq(T type,
                                 java.lang.String name)
Check if the module called name is a callback ordering prerequisite for this module. In other words, if this function returns true for the given name, then this message listener will be called after that message listener.

Parameters:
type - the message type to which this applies
name - the name of the module
Returns:
whether name is a prerequisite.

isCallbackOrderingPostreq

boolean isCallbackOrderingPostreq(T type,
                                  java.lang.String name)
Check if the module called name is a callback ordering post-requisite for this module. In other words, if this function returns true for the given name, then this message listener will be called before that message listener.

Parameters:
type - the message type to which this applies
name - the name of the module
Returns:
whether name is a post-requisite.
